description:
Brian Carpenter discovered that pngcrush incorrectly handled specially
crafted file.
An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.
title: pngcrush vulnerability
summary: A security issue was fixed in pngcrush
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
pngcrush could be made to crash if it opened a specially crafted
file.
